title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: The "Build" popup action is incorrectly enabled even when a manual build is not necessary because the build has already been done automatically.
OB: The "Build" popup action is enabled even when a manual build is not necessary.
EB: The "Build" popup action should only be enabled if a manual build is necessary, not when the build has already been done automatically.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Check the enablement of the "Build" popup action.
3. Verify that the "Build" popup action is enabled even when a manual build is not needed.
